pr_title: Better instrumentation support for dynamic Spring HandlerMapping

timeline.bodyText: Not exactly... might also discard if a duplicate.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message: only invoke HandlerMappings which set BEST_MATCHING_PATTERN_ATTRIBUTE from instrumented filter chain, add testing around completely dynamic handler mapping
